title.narrative: The Young Women for Awareness, Agency, Advocacy, and Accountability (YW4A) Programme

description.narrative: Influence the adoption, amendment, withdrawal or effective utilisation and implementation of laws and policies towards promoting young women’s rights to leadership, participation and ending SGBV in South Sudan by 2025.

The programme aims to strengthen and diversify young women’s participation and amplify their voices to effectively influence decision-making towards gender-just laws, policies, norms, and practices related to their bodily integrity and equal participation.

title.narrative: IO 4a Key laws and policies are adopted, amended, or repealed towards promoting young women’s rights to leadership, participation and ending SGBV, and are effectively implemented.

description.narrative: Under intermediate outcome (IO) 4, also referred to as Pathway 4, the Young Women for Awareness, Agency, Advocacy and Accountability (YW4A) programme aims to influence the adoption, amendment, withdrawal or effective utilisation and implementation of laws and policies towards promoting young women’s rights to leadership, participation and ending SGBV in South Sudan by 2025.

title.narrative: # of (targeted) laws, policies and strategies adopted, amended, withdrawn, better used or implemented to eradicate all forms of violence against women and girls in public and private life.

description.narrative: Advocacy towards the enactment of the draft Anti-GBV Bill and Family Law Bill. Involvement in the Permanent Constitution-making process to define marriageable age as over the age of 18 in line with the Child Act and Penal Code Act, improve the provision on customary law and criminalize marital rape by repealing Section 247(3) of the Penal Code Act.

title.narrative: O 4b No of (targeted) laws, policies and strategies adopted, amended, withdrawn, better used or implemented to promote women’s voice, agency, leadership, and representative participation in decision-making processes in the public, private and civic sphere.

description.narrative: Under intermediate outcome (IO) 4, also referred to as Pathway 4, the Young Women for Awareness, Agency, Advocacy and Accountability (YW4A) programme aims to influence the adoption, amendment, withdrawal or effective utilisation and implementation of laws and policies towards promoting young women’s rights to leadership, participation in South Sudan by 2025

title.narrative: # of (targeted) laws, policies and strategies adopted, amended, withdrawn, better used or implemented to promote women’s voice, agency, leadership, and representative participation in decision-making processes in the public, private and civic sphere.

description.narrative: Better implementation of the 35% gender representation under the Transitional Constitution.

title.narrative: # of (targeted) laws, policies and strategies adopted, amended, withdrawn, better used or implemented to promote women’s voice, agency, leadership, and representative participation in decision-making processes in the public, private and civic sphere.

description.narrative: Advocacy towards the ratification of the Maputo Protocol and the African Charter on the Rights and Welfare of the Child

reference.code: WRGE 2.1 disaggregated by WRG004: # interntional agreements
